column2: SR 2014 No.2 - the management of extractive waste.
SR 2015 No.1 - onshore oil exploration.
Mining waste operation.
Mining waste operation with a non-hazardous extractive waste facility.
Mining waste operation with a hazardous extractive waste facility.
Mining waste flare, whether or not an installation.
Groundwater activity which is part of a mining waste operation.
SR 2015 No. 2 - storage and handling of up to 500 tonnes crude oil.
Storage and handling of crude oil or petroleum with a capacity of less than 500 tonnes.
SR 2009 No.8 - management of inert extractive waste; OR Management inert extractive waste, inc. with a point source discharge or by passive treatment.
Management of non-inert non-hazardous extractive waste.
Management of any extractive waste in a Category A mining waste facility; OR Management of hazardous extractive waste.
Mobile plant - land spreading.

Section 5.2 - landfill for hazardous waste; including leachate management, storage and/ or treatment and landfill restoration.
Leachate treatment with capacity of 50t or more a day where not authorised by a landfill permit or permit authorising the discharge of trade effluent.
Leachate treatment plant with a capacity of less than 50 tonnes a day where not authorised by a landfill permit or trade effluent discharge consent.
Landfill gas plant at a landfill for hazardous waste and where not authorised by a landfill permit.
Landfill for inert waste; including restoration.

Closed landfill that accepted hazardous or non-hazardous waste; inc. landfill gas and leachate management, storage/treatment and landfill restoration.
Closed landfill hazardous or non-hazardous waste with low potential for pollution; OR Closed landfill other non-inert wastes inc. landfill restoration
Closed landfill that accepted hazardous, non-hazardous or other non-inert waste shown to have a very low potential for pollution.
Closed landfill that accepted inert waste including restoration.
Closed landfill that accepted inert waste shown by a risk assessment approved by the Agency to have a very low potential for pollution.
